import React, { Component } from "react"; function Student(props) { let { student } = props; const viewStudent = () => { listContext.isToggleAction(true, "", student); } return ( {props.stt + 1} {student.studentId} {student.studentName} {student.studentAge} {student.studentSex.toString() == "true" ? "Nam" : (student.studentSex.toString() == "false" ? "Nữ" : "Khác")}
) } export default Student
